A remake of IndestructoTank, with some elements from Indestruc2Tank.

Strap on your IndestructoBelts - it's gonna be a bumpy ride!

name: Star Fox Wii
description: An unreleased Star Fox game that was intended for the Wii. Some of it’s intended aspects were later used in Star Fox Zero

name: Kid Icarus
description: Sin descripción

name: Holos lisu
description: Holos lisu is an exciting story based on Ukrainian folklore. Enter the role of an agent of the Police Bureau of Investigation and find out what secrets the forest hides. Meet local residents and immerse yourself in their stories. Put the puzzle pieces together to see the full picture and reveal Yvette's story. Hear the voice of the forest!

name: Wildwood
description: Wildwood is a short anthology visual novel about fairy tales and folklore from Europe, Britain and Russia

name: Anime Spa
description: Anime Spa is a game where you own a spa. You recruit girls and have them work in order to satisfy the otakus who come to be relaxed or for other kinds of services. There are four girls to recruit: Chihaya, Nami, Tsunade, Chika, and Hayasaka. It has over 50 different animations and gameplay you will see nowhere else.

name: Habanero-tan House
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Drift 16-Bit
description: Get ready to race with Sonic Drift 16-bit, the electrifying Genesis-style kart racer brought to you by the creators of Sonic Triple Trouble 16-bit! This bold Game Gear reimagining speeds its way into the spotlight, delivering an exhilarating "best-of" the Sonic Drift series in a vibrant, revamped form!

name: Frackin' Universe
description: Frackin' Universe (FU) is a continuously evolving mod for Starbound, amplifying the game in numerous ways since the inception of modding. It enhances nearly every element of the base game, introducing fresh mechanics and content, spanning from new mission, biomes, planets, an extensively revamped crafting system, science, research, monsters, tiles, and a plethora of other in-game assets.

name: Puzzle & Dragons Story
description: A puzzle RPG made exclusively for Apple Arcade.

name: Virtua Fighter 3tb Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortnite Festival
description: Play in a band with friends or perform solo on stage with hit music by your favorite artists in Fortnite Festival! On the Main Stage, play a featured rotation of Jam Tracks. Compete against friends for the best performance or team up to climb the leaderboards. The festival is just beginning with more Jam Tracks, Music Icons, concerts, and stages coming soon. Take your stage in Fortnite Festival!

name: Bracket Chain
description:
An action-packed adventure where you dash, grab, and fling your way through a variety of stages!
Follow the robot Bracket as he ventures out of his technology-driven home realm and into Alastair, a mysterious new realm governed exclusively by magic. Meet determined allies, heartfelt villagers, zany goons, and dangerous villains.

name: Crown of greed
description: Ascend to the throne of Rodovia - a mystical realm inspired by Slavic mythology. Engage in an unusual, indirect management system in which you can't issue direct orders and must skillfully bend your subjects and heroes to your will. Perfect your ruling skills to build, expand and secure your legacy.

name: Homeland
description: The ancient Darkness has awakened, a black abyss of madness opened up in the mythical and real world.. Our protagonist's girlfriend has been kidnapped by strangers without reason, why they did this? You need to deal with this creatures!

name: House spirit cat
description: Kot-Domovoy is a visual novel with interactive features. It’s a story about a kind spirit of a house in the shape of a cat who is searching for a new owner. Will it find a new home or a place of despair? You are to choose.

name: SCP: Rulebreaker
description: Dive into the heart of horror with this survival game inspired by the mysterious SCP Foundation. After the opening of Site 1730, once the stronghold of the Foundation, chaos has erupted. All sites, except Sites 15 and 19, have been abandoned, converging towards Complex 1730. An unprecedented concentration of anomalies released during a containment breach has left the complex in a state of desolation. Step into the shoes of a Foundation guard, facing the ultimate survival challenge as the horrors of anomalies threaten to engulf everything.

name: Pico de Pon
description: The classic 16-bit-era action puzzle game returns again - enhanced and remastered. Pico de Pon brings favorite characters from across the PICO-8 library together for intense block-swapping battle.

name: Eviternity II
description:
Eviternity II is a 37-level megawad for Doom II using MBF21-compatible source ports, created by a team lead by Joshua O'Sullivan (Dragonfly). It was released on December 10, 2023, the 30th anniversary of Doom's release and the 5th anniversary of the original Eviternity. Making extensive use of a newly updated build of the OTEX texture pack (to be released as a standalone texture pack in the future), Eviternity II’s six chapters explore a series of unique and varied themes, continuing on from where you left off after the Archangelus’ defeat!

The 37 maps are split in six episodes that each have five regular maps and one secret map, plus one credit map.

name: A War On Christmas: Part 2
description: A War On Christmas: Part 2 is a 12 map sequel to last year's Christmas rampage. Featuring the things you loved about the original and much, much more!

name: Holiday Hits
description: Holiday Hits is a limit-removing set of 7 small simple DOOM 2 maps that uses Arsinikk's 2023 updated version of the classic Doom X-Mas pack.

name: Terminal Voltage
description: Terminal Voltage is a new episode of electric maps for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

name: The Last of Us Part II Remastered: W.L.F. Edition
description: The Last of Us Part II Remastered W.L.F. Edition includes steelbook case with full game featuring additional digital content for PS5.

name: Crush Crush: - 18+ Naughty
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal: Hellsinger - Complete Edition
description: Dig your claws into the complete Metal: Hellsinger experience with the base game and all DLCs, containing more original and licensed music, new weapons, and new outfits.

name: Lake Adventure
description: A metafictional text adventure game by BJ Best. In-universe, written by young Eddie Hughes in 1993, and annotated by Ed Hughes in 2020.

name: Hanabi Shokunin ni Narou 2
description:
Fireworks are a class of explosive pyrotechnic devices used for aesthetic, cultural, and religious purposes. A fireworks event (also called a fireworks show or pyrotechnics) is a display of the effects produced by firework devices. Fireworks competitions are also regularly held at a number of places. Fireworks take many forms to produce the four primary effects: noise, light, smoke and floating materials (confetti for example.) They may be designed to burn with flames and sparks of many colors, typically red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, , silver and gold. Displays are common throughout the world and are the focal point of many cultural and religious celebrations.

During the summer in Japan, fireworks festivals are held nearly every day someplace in the country, in total numbering more than 200 during August. The festivals consist of large fireworks shows, the largest of which use between 100,000 and 120,000 rounds (PL Art of Fireworks), and can attract more than 800,000 spectators. Street vendors set up stalls to sell various drinks and staple Japanese food (such as Yakisoba, Okonomiyaki, Takoyaki, kakigori (shaved ice), and traditionally held festival games, such as Kingyo-sukui, or Goldfish scooping.

Hanabi Shokunin ninarou 2 is a fireworks simulator. You can enjoy dinamic Full 3D Fireworks! Make your best fireworks show with new functions and camera edits. Waremono, Pokamono, Katamono, Uchidashimono, Shikake... You can easily make almost every kind of FireWorks which you can see in the real Japanese Fireworks show. Your creation comes back to life again with beautiful view.

When summer rolls around, the thoughts of the masses turn to barbecues, bikinis, the beach and fireworks. Those incendiary blossoms and blooms which sprout in the heavens and thrill witnesses with bright lights and explosive effects. Hanabi Shokunin Ninarou 2 features a wide assortment of fireworks to design, view, edit and experience on the PS2. Common sorts such as radial explosions and spherical blasts are fairly easy to create but elaborate fireworks may also be crafted which show complete figures, scenes and other elaborate sky theater.

name: Toree Jolly Jam
description: Toree Jolly Jam is a short little, speed based, one level 3D Platformer, in a wintery holiday coating, that rewards the player with certain goodies. Finishing the level will grant the player several bonus "presents" to choose from, containing different surprises. These could be anything from new characters (or multiple characters at once!) to completely different minigames. There is even an old fashioned retro styled "sound test" hidden in there somewhere (as pointless as it might be nowadays).

name: Myrm Emblem
description: An FE8 hack with every playable myrmidon from across the series

name: Reverse 1999: The Theft of the Rimet Cup
description:
Version 1.1 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Melania, Pickles, and Diggers
• New Garments for Regulus, Centurion, and APPLe
• New main event: The Theft of the Rimet Cup
• …and more!

name: Reverse 1999: A Nightmare at Green Lake
description:
Version 1.2 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:

• New characters: Tooth Fairy, Jessica, Blonney, and Horropedia

• New Garments for X, Sotheby, Bkornblume, and Eagle

• New main event: A Nightmare At Green Lake

• …and more!

name: ErMa: Early Mammal
description: A mysterious force has set up shop in the distant past, and is doing everything in its power to ensure reptiles - particularly, dinosaurs - remain the planet's dominant life for good. Erma is our completely unwitting heroine, and it's your job to help her help us!

name: Headmaster Disaster
description: It's a new school year at Sawfish High School, but with the entrance of a mysterious new principal, it's no longer ordinary. Teachers are acting strangely and students are ferocious and feral. Follow Hazel and Petros as they not only fight for their grades but also their minds and uncover secrets about their world's past. But remember, there's no homework, that is... because you may never come home.

name: Tech-Panic
description: Tasked with collecting presents, the goofy little robot boy is back and ready to do his best.

name: Occultryx: Beast of Nocturne
description: Occultryx: Beast of Nocturne is a story that follows the Bounty Hunter H-13 "Dysis" Hunting down a rival and elusive bounty. A werewolf master of combat who has taken over a mysterious facility on the planet Stygia. The nearby city and surrounding areas have been infected with the wolf's curse. It's Dysis' job to wade through the the creatures, hazards, and minions to track down her bounty!

name: Mother Mixup!
description:
Eric from Business of Loving gets a bit lost on his way back from work, and ends up in an interesting place... Welcome to Fertile Grove!

Stephanie is nice enough to give him a little shelter for the night, but her hospitality comes with a little more than just a bed to sleep in...

Play this crossover mini game by Dead-End and Fulvi!

With 4 scenes, enjoy this crossover special combining Business of Loving & Fertile Grove.

name: OnlyFap Simulator
description: OnlyFap Simulator is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to make a post. After each level an amount of post becomes higher, and you need to hire manager and do analytics to build a huge fan base

name: Sonic: Lock & Load
description:
Sonic: Lock & Load is a hyper-fast stylish action first-person shooter based on the Sonic the Hedgehog series of games and built on GZDoom.

It's heavily inspired by the high-speed platforming of Sonic Robo Blast 2, the heavily movement-based FPS gameplay of ULTRAKILL and the stylish action of Devil May Cry.

name: Grassland Survivors
description: A Vampire Survivors clone for PICO-8. You can level up, collect XP, increase your character stats, and more.

name: Normal Super Mario Bros. DX
description: An enhanced port of Normal Super Mario Bros.

name: Normal Super Mario Bros. 2 DX
description: An enhanced port of Normal Super Mario Bros. 2.

name: Normal Super Mario Bros. Trilogy DX
description:
Normal Super Mario Bros. is a series of fangames created by gamester and released for PC. Trilogy DX is a port of the original games, with enhanced features, making the games available in other platforms.

The first the was released in December 2023, with the first game 99% and the second about 60% complete. The third game wasn't available yet.

name: Zoo Tycoon 2: Forgotten Animals
description: A mod of the PC game which lets you build your own zoos Zoo Tycoon 2, of which features animals from the first Zoo Tycoon game that didn’t appear in the sequel.

name: Zoo Tycoon: Dinosaur Digs - No Grass, Please!
description: A mod to the Dinosaur Digs expansion of Zoo Tycoon that makes changes to the animals featured, and even adds in 4 new ones.

name: Null
description:
Null is a fast-paced sci-fi Arena FPS inspired by the all-time classic "Quake III Arena"!
In this game you play as a robot fighting against other players in online Free-For-All matches.

name: The Ratchelor Season 3: Rats in the City
description: IT’S HERE! 21 new charming rats are ready to woo you. Which one will you choose? The Ratchelor 3: Rats In The City is now online and free!

name: Nuklear Klone
description: A Nuclear Throne demake for the PICO-8. You play as Suzie and Bob who are trapped in a merciless world and have to fight your way out!

name: Pee Pee Bon Bon: Qusumi Masayuki No Appare Characters 100
description: Sin descripción

name: World Engine Fantazion
description: Adventure interactive game developed by Scitron & Art.

name: A Posteriori
description: An experience where you traverse through a fever dream.

name: Silly Employee
description: It is now the school break period. Arata, a high school student, decides to apply to be an employee at the (suspicious) café.

name: Peter's Magic Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Sweet Skullvivors
description: Unleash the power of Mexican food to survive the hordes of hungry Alebrijes. Make the most colorful and delicious Ofrenda the world has ever seen.

name: Isaac Asimov's The Ultimate Robot
description: Interactive encyclopedia on Isaac Asimov and his theories of robotics. The program features video clips, robot schematics, encyclopedic information and other interesting stuff as well as clips of Asimov talking about the future of robots.

name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Dai-hanabi
description: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Oohanabi is a Pachi-Slot simulation game developed and published by Aruze for Neo Geo Pocket Color.

name: Doki-doki Literature Club! GB Version
Five Card Draw Poker
description:
The crowd couldn't make it over for the regular weekly game?
Relax, your personal computer will play 5 card DRAW POKER and bring the crowd with it.

COMPUTER DRAW POKER sets you up with four other players controlled by the computer.
Lucky, Shifty, Ace, and Slim are their names and they play a smart game, each in their own personal way.
Players betting strategy is based on their hand and the betting behavior of the other players.

name: Monolithic Laser
description: Monolithic Laser is a Space Invaders clone. The player shoots alien vessels to try to stop an alien invasion. The player controls a small space ship in the bottom half of the screen which can move in 4 cardinal directions. Moving left to right on the top half of the screen are the invading alien vessels, which fire randomly upon the defending player. If your ship is hit, it is destroyed. When the player has destroyed all ships, they move to a higher difficulty level with faster moving ships that fire more frequently. The player has a total of 3 lives. When all are lost, it's game over.

name: Bob en el Polo
description: The objective of Bob en el polo is quite simple: eat a certain number of eggs in each of the 10 levels of the game, avoiding the enemies, in a limited amount of time. The player can also move the blocks on the screen, like in Pengo, but without the possibility to kill enemies. Blocks can only be moved for defensive purposes. The start level can be selected from the main menu.

name: Almeria's Conection
description: Sin descripción

name: Aliens'n Tanks
description:
On a quiet day in a log cabin in Texas, war veteran Billy Boots was watching television when he suddenly hears a loud noise in the backyard.

Surprised, he goes out to investigate to see what happened and realizes that aliens are invading the United States.

Billy Boots, as a good patriot, cannot allow anyone to harm his precious country, so he rides on the tank that he had stored as a memory of the Great War and with all the decision in the world, he advances towards the horizon to end the invaders.

Will he be victorious?

name: Mr. Angry Dude
description:
Play as Mr Angry Dude, A dude of pure perpetual anger, using his ability to move the very ground he is near.You have to puzzle-shift your way to the exit.

Collect all the keys in the series of rooms that doesn't make Mr Angry Dude's mood any better.

name: StarRunner
description:
It is a time of war in your galaxy. Your people, the Atarians, defend against constant attacks from the Commodorians. Due to circumstances beyond your control (a fixed lottery), it has been decided that you, Rom Antic, must deliver vital details to a secret base hidden deep in a safe part of your galaxy.

You hop into your aging ship, the Pokey Cruiser, and take off with no time to spare.

Unfortunately, the shortest path to the base is blocked by 10 waves of deadly asteroids and mines.

Your rather BASIC laser can only dispatch the smallest asteroids, so you will need to rely heavily on evasive maneuvers to dodge your way through all 10 waves and safely reach your goal.

Good luck! Atarians in the galaxy are counting on you!

name: Pesterquest Rewritten
description: A fanmade rewrite of Homestuck - Pesterquest!

name: Just Dance 2015 China and Just Dance 2017 China Combo Pack
description:
A combo pack with Just Dance 2015 China (舞力全开2015) and Just Dance 2017 China (舞力全开2017)

The only version we know of is for Xbox One

name: Baba Yaga learns to read
description: Educational game for learning to read

name: Indiana Jones and the Gold of Genghis Khan
description: Sin descripción

name: The Eye of Typhoon: Tsunami Edition/Saiki
description: The Eye of Typhoon: Tsunami Edition/Saiki is a fan-made project aiming to bring The Eye of Typhoon to the platform it was originally developed on, the Neo Geo, and overhaul it.

name: Pokémon Dark Worship
description: A Fire Red Hack with a New Region, New Story, Mega Evolution, Z Moves, Dynamax/Gigantamax, YouTubers as NPCs & Much More!

name: Lost Mansion
description: A request takes you into a weird forest to investigate. There is someone in the forest and you are caught and locked in an old mansion. Avoid and hide from dangers in the mansion, survive, defeat them, and escape!

name: Slime Link
description: We combine a deck-building game and a connect-and-match game. You play as a slime who travels to another world. By building your deck, you defeat your enemies and return to the real world.

name: Great Filter
description: A 2D top-down view, strategy game, with original mechanics. The game consists of 46 levels and each level takes 30-60 seconds to clear. You would strategically operate two characters to collect diamonds from mines, sent diamonds into “little universe” to generate bricks and pave the way to the key.

name: Heat Death: Survival Train
description: Heat Death is a sci-fi survival game where you can build, upgrade, and customize your battle train to explore and survive a frozen world! This train is not only your shelter and vehicle, but also your weapon and ally to face hostile drones, deadly storms, and hidden mysteries of an unknown world!

name: The Inn at Nightfall
description: Manage an inn for travelers seeking refuge before nightfall. Interact with diverse guests, each harboring their own secrets. Your choices can forge or fracture relationships, uncovering hidden truths along the way. But beware - the real threat may be hiding among your guests.

name: Hidden Object Legends: Deadly Love - Collector's Edition
description: The lives of three ordinary men become closely intertwined with the life of one woman. One by friendship, one by love, and one by murder. Will you be able to unravel this tangle and find the murderer?

name: Eternal Reverie
description: Dive into 'Eternal Reverie,' a team-based roguelike shooter exploring the mysteries of an eternal war. Solo or in co-op, navigate diverse planets, pilot unique ships, and customize with 80+ upgrades. Unveil secrets on branching paths to increase your roster and discover the truths of the universe

name: Voice Love on Air
description: This game is a BL dating sim game with a unique twist of voice acting and studio management elements. The story tells how Aki, a new voice director who has to complete several BL Dramas, and the charming voice actors fall in love with each other.

name: Dawn of Demons
description: Become a medieval monk and confront the demon that has haunted the Boar Lake village.

name: Apocalypse Inc
description: Welcome to Apocalypse Inc, the ultimate idle game where you take command of apocalyptic minions and unleash chaos upon the world!

name: Sugar,sugar,sugarcoat
description: "Sugar,sugar,sugarcoat" is a simulation game set in a school. Interact with the girls and gain their love. You must then offer that love to the devil you love.

name: Muzy
description: Explore the mystery behind a once-loved and hugely popular children's toy, also known as Muzy, in this terrifying horror adventure game. Several reports detail frightening incidents connected to accidents. Your job is to solve the puzzles and find the cause of these unsettling occurrences.

name: Hexbot Colony
description: Build and manage multiple colonies on different planets. Heavy focus on mining and industry, and setting up automated cargo transport between colonies. Also there are mysterious alien drones that will attack you, so you'll need some weapons to fight them off.

name: Adopted Passion Realize Your Dream
description: Enjoy a massive first-person adventure to become the greatest racer ever!!! Buy, collect, build, personalize and maintain your vehicles with hundreds of parts to achieve maximum style and performance! All while trying to survive the elements of life's daily requirements.

name: Space Wackos
description: Metal Raiders is a multiplayer and cooperative FPS game made by Nelson Peralta. Players can create an account in order to play and keep track of their progress.‍Featuring 8 maps and 6 game types, players have the freedom fight against each other in free-for-all or as a team.

name: Ninja: The Lost Legacy
description: A stealth fast-paced ninja game where you eliminate your enemies with elegance to get the artifacts that have been stolen from you. Inspired from movement shooters, stealth games and ninja culture. Different terrains and settlements will let you carve various approach to enemy territories.

name: Onward and Upward! DX
description: Climb from the Earth to the Moon to try and solve an urban legend! Brave tough challenges as you float and grapple your way up to the tune of a great soundtrack! Be sure to bring a space suit, and get climbing!

name: Dark Gaze: Curse of the Black Nazar
description: It is night time at the occult museum. As curator, you have acquired a strange artifact. Unaware of its dark nature, you place it on its reserved spot between other artifacts. You notice that strange events starts to occur. Eventually realizing that you, might not be the only living creature inside.

name: Feline Shenanigans
description: Mathias Schultz is a dude looking to make some extra dough to afford a vacation to Thailand. He accepts a job offer to babysit a family of cats while the owners are on vacation. But to Mathias's surprise, The cat's stir up quite the ruckus and it's up to Mathias to survive the frightening ordeal.

name: The Bard for Her
description: A visual novel, dating sim with map exploration. Play a womanizing bard with a lute and romance and build a relationship with five attractive women.

name: Whispering Shadows
description: Put yourself in the shoes of a schizophrenic person and experiment the hell of the voices

name: Tiny Jukebox
description: A crazy rythm game with 70+ short songs (10 seconds-long). How long can you survive?

name: Welcome to Planet E1d0r4d0!
description: Welcome to Planet E1d0r4d0! is a story-driven game about a young girl exploring the meaning of existence in a corner of the universe, including visual novel, simulation combined with side-scrolling adventure. In this chaotic and disorderly universe, even infinite lives seem so fragile.

name: Neon Life
description: [Neon Life] is Aoki Studio's first self-developed 3D project, an anime cyberpunk-style open-city role-playing game.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Wonder of U
description: Wield the power of Wonder of U and cause calamity to any opponent that gets in your way! Use the natural laws of calamity to your advantage to inevitably sway victory in your favor!

name: GeoJelly: in the Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Light-It Up: Neon Adventure
description: Embark on a neon adventure through more than 130 new levels!

name: Official Spacefarer Card Game
description: Sin descripción

name: City Bus Driver Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Winter Games Challenge
description: Faster, farther, higher!

name: ToyBox Christmas
description: The Christmas toys are everywhere! Can you fit them all into the toybox? ToyBox Christmas has many colourful levels guaranteed to challenge your critical thinking!

name: Princess Puzzle Adventure
description: Embark on a royal journey with "Princess Puzzle Adventure," a captivating jigsaw puzzle game that brings the magic of fairy tales to life.

name: Fitness Boxing: Fist of the North Star - Expansion Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Goonya Monster: Fake Type - Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Goonya Monster: Buster - Lord Ham/Fake Type
description: Sin descripción

name: Goonya Monster: Buster - Iwasake-chan/Fake Type
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai World: Happy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pony World: Color by Numbers
description: Colour your way through the enchanting Pony World!

name: Arcade Archives: Pole Position II
description:
"POLE POSITION II" is a racing game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1983.
The game is divided into qualifying and grand prix. If you make a lap in the qualifying round with a good time, you will advance to the grand prix.
In addition, new courses have been added to this title.
Aim for pole position on four different courses!

name: Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew – Complete Edition
description: The Complete Edition includes the Main Game, the DLC expansions Shadow Gambit: Yuki's Wish and Shadow Gambit: Zagan's Ritual as well as the Original Soundtrack and the Artbook & Strategy Guide in one package at a special discount price.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Voidfarer Edition
description: This is the Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader ultimate experience! Jump into the Koronus Expanse sufficiently prepared and with symbols of powers that suits your status!

name: Thrilling Stories Collection
description: Explore the depths of suspense, adventure, and intrigue. Immerse yourself in fascinating worlds, solve captivating mysteries and discover extraordinary stories.

name: M.A.D. Cows
description: M.A.D. Cows is an exciting, retro, action platform game. Mow down aliens. Buy better guns. Rescue cows, dogs, raccoons, and more.

name: Baldur's Gate 3: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition upgrade content includes in-game cosmetics, such as a unique custom dice skin to show off to your friends, as well as practical in-game items such as the Mask of the Shapeshifter from Divinity: Original Sin 2.

Listen to the magical music of Borislav Slavov’s Original Soundtrack for Baldur’s Gate 3 or even pick up a pen and play D&D as one of our Origin characters with the handy printable pre-made character sheets. There’s plenty to get stuck into, in and outside of the game.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Bring the Boom Edition
description:
The AEW: Fight Forever Bring the Boom deluxe edition includes the main game PLUS access to Matt Hardy, Broken Matt Hardy and Seasons 1 and 2 DLC, totaling 10 wrestlers, 4 mini-games, a new arena, an all-new tournament mode AND 10 new tracks. More details below:

- The AEW: Fight Forever Matt Hardy Pack which features two of the many Matt Hardys: Mat Hardy and Broken Matt Hardy
- The AEW: Fight Forever FTR: Revival Pack which features AEW wrestlers Dax Harwood and Cash Wheeler PLUS minigames JoinUs and Deth Race-X
- The AEW: Fight Forever Limitless Bunny Bundle which features AEW wrestlers The Bunny and Keith Lee PLUS minigames MJF Car Thrash and Sloth Sling
- The AEW: Fight Forever Hookhausen Very Handsome, Very Evil Pack which featues AEW wrstlers HOOK and Danhausen.
- The AEW: Fight Forever Dynamite Featuring The Acclaimed DLC which features the boldest Tag Team in AEW history, Anthony Bowens and Max Caster of The Acclaimed, PLUS the brand new Dynamite themed arena.
- The AEW: Fight Forever Beat the Elite DLC which features an all-new gameplay mode, Beat the Elite. Beat the Elite introduces single-player, offline tournament competition to the most competitive Fight Forever players.
- The AEW: Fight Forever The Storm is Coming DLC which features the legendary women's wrestling champion from down under Toni Storm. Storm joins the Fight Forever playable roster along with 10 new tracks.

name: Clue: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cooties
description: Ahhh!!!! Girls have cooties!!!! And it's Valentine's Day!!! How can you make it through the day alive!? Beat off the girls with rocks, trash cans, and giant pencils, of course!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Deluxe Edition
description: THE FIRST CLASSIC CRPG IN THE WARHAMMER 40,000 UNIVERSE

name: Fade^2
description: FADE^2 is a 2D action game that brings platformer, runner and music interactive genre all together. A desperate journey of the reanimated one, and the storytelling of music from the bleached world. Run along the music, and play along the course!

name: Runner
description: This is a motion capture game with a focus on parkour. The player's computer needs to be equipped with a camera to better experience the game. After starting the game, the camera will capture the movements of the human body in real time.

name: Elf Shield
description: CONTENTS: Action Game full-set (7 Stages) and future updates if available. Elf-Shield is one of the best games if you are fan of late 80s' PC games or are looking for bite-size simple game. This game is a modernized BreakOut like action game with 80s taste Pixel Graphics and Anime Style graphics.

name: Ulimek
description: Ulimek is a fast-paced platformer where you dash through the levels as fast (or as chill) as you like using a similar hookshot mechanic.

name: Cybercore Leap
description: Embark on a captivating journey alongside your loyal assistant in this experimental 3D platformer game. Equip yourself with the JumpPack and antigravity grapple as you undertake your mission: locate the cybercore and execute a crucial reset.

name: Closing Shift
description: As you were closing for the night, you see a creature in the distance approaching. Fight for you life using the limited resources inside your grocery store.

name: Curse Seal Rotation
description: Curse Seal Rotation is a rougelike card game. You will play a warrior to defeat invaders one after another. On this difficult road, you will encounter various monsters and elites. Please become as strong as possible to defeat them.

name: Sacrifices
description: Dive into the 'Sacrifices', a narrative-driven adventure game where you unravel the poignant tale of a child's reality.

name: Hoofobia
description: Hoofobia is the multiplayer deer VS hunter PVP. When playing as deer, use stealth & strategy to sneak around vast forests and attack the lone hunter in order to escape his proximity without becoming a wall decoration.

name: BadDool
description: Baddool is a rhythm based card battler. Explore a dungeon with fun and exciting characters and foes. Build a deck of cards by exploring a dungeon and use your cards to kill enemies and gain more exciting cards! Make friends by helping them out or challenge them to a DOOL to kill them for their loot.

name: Rooftops & Alleys: The Parkour Game
description: Ever felt like the world was missing that one Parkour/Freerunning game? That game that scratches that itch that other games just don't? Rooftops & Alleys aka TheParkourGame is here to deliver! In this game, there's is no 'hold button to parkour' mentality. Here, you, the player is in control!

name: Five-Star: Chef Ops
description: Make no mistake rookie - this ain't a cooking game. This is a tactical kitchen simulation with a hint of cooking. Dive into the culinary universe of Five Star: Chef Ops, a strategy-packed adrenaline ride where every second drains profits and every miscalculated action brings calamity upon you.

name: Run and Retry
description: In this fast and demanding game, the player must demonstrate mastery to managing his skills, in order to beat the world record. The gameplay is geared so that players can challenge each other.

name: Lead: Rally
description: Feel the wind on your face as you strap on your helmet. The beauty of the hills ahead is deceptive; every turn could make or break your championship dreams. As the engine roars to life, you know that only your skills can pave the road to success. Welcome to LEAD – Rally.

name: The Snare
description: The Snare is a single-player crime and horror game. Atlas follows clues sent by the killer to rescue his wife Samira. While trying to find out the reason for Samira's kidnapping, he encounters surprising facts.

name: Neverending Light
description: A guided tour goes horribly wrong when monsters eat everyone!

name: Notes To Myself
description: The horror began when you wrote your first note.

name: Rift: Genesis
description: Stylized Sci-Fi Movement FPS with and influence on melee and shooter based combat and abilities. That takes place across dimensions.

name: Telvoikai
description: You've been tasked with collecting data on an alien planet. Choose between exploring the jungle tropics or navigating deep into the bioluminescent sea.

name: Rolley-Ball
description: Try to roll a ball out of several mazes/puzzles.

name: Frostbiter
description: Can you survive Frostbiter and escape his snowy maze of horror? Use snowballs to defend yourself, find your way in the maze, try to escape, and most important of all: don't let him catch you!

name: Tank Of The Kayra
description: Complete the mission with the Last Remaining Tank!

name: A Long Survive
description: Will you be able to survive? Long Survive is a cooperative shooter in which you'll have to survive waves of enemies. Protect the nexus by fortifying your area with various structures and prepare for the siege. Upgrade your weapons, strategize with your teammates. Survive!

name: Dungeons of Dragons
description: "In an age of guns, swords, and magic, the Philosopher's Stone, which maintains the balance of Dungeons and Dragons, has been stolen. The world hangs in the balance. It's all up to you..."Honestly, we can't make it all up all the time. Let's have an adventure together!

name: Heptic Arena
description: Heptic Arena is a Free to Play Online Action Multiplayer Shooter Arena where contenders are competing against each other in an Intergalactic Game Show.

name: Tempo Cube
description: Rhythm with Tempo Cube! This is a rhythm game, Cube will bounce between walls and blocks to rhythm with the music. Use WASD along the move directions at the right time to score and combo! You may upload your own midi file to create your custom game scene!

name: Forward Brave
description: 《Forward Brave》has no turning back. Choose your hero, explore the program-generated card dungeon, collect resources, kill enemies, combine and match active skills with various special-effect artifacts, make rational use of various props and buffs, move to the next floor, and finally win the victory!

name: Versebound
description: Versebound is a challenging action roguelike with bullet hell elements. Slay hordes of enemies and dodge projectiles in handcrafted environments, outmaneuver versatile boss encounters and collect XP to craft your optimal build! Here, verses wield power...

name: EndlessEx
description: Simple flying (maybe jumping), mini-games with the goal of the highest score.

name: Paper Work
description: Navigate a thrilling blend of fast-paced action and RPG looting as you make deals, undertake missions, sign contracts, and raise your character level inside of the urban dungeon crawler Paper Work.

name: Santa's busy day
description: Santa has a hard time, delivering all his presents on time. In this little Arcade Game, you will help him fly over the roofs and drop the presents in the right spot. But be careful:The game gets progressivly harder, as Santa's reindeer is flying faster and faster and faster.

name: MechAvenger
description: MechAvenger is a fast paced VR shooter and platformer about fighting robots after the end of humanity. Shoot, punch, jump and climb your way through the enemy horde, and shut down their factory.

name: Guns'N'Wheels
description: Fast cars with big guns. Customisable, Arena Based, Vehicular Combat. Play Singleplayer story mode or compete in Multiplayer high skill battles, unlocking arenas, cars and decals. Rank up to be crowned a Legend. Play in Single player, Online PvP or Split screen.

name: Backrooms: The Hunt
description: You are a member of the newly formed department of Artifact Hunters within the company B.E.I. Your role involves seeking and collecting enigmatic artifacts within the Backrooms. This department emerged following the successful stabilization of a portal

name: BattleProgress
description: You want to create your own battleplan? Keep the overview and outplay your opponent with brilliant moves! Manage your economy and research whisly to create the perfect composition of units which defeat the opponent and his army, but be carefull: The opponent will try the same!

name: Quitting Simulator
description: You're a disgruntled office drone who gets creative when your dystopian employer won’t let you quit. Armed with a quirky arsenal of improvised weapons (and trusty magic fishing rod) you set off on a quest to climb the corporate ladder, and free yourself from the shackles of bureaucratic oppression.

name: Wicked Wreck
description: Wicked Wreck allows fans of all ages to explore the World of the most amazing Way, find secret zones, explore adventures, finish the rpg quest, and interact with CineGame beloved characters. Wicked Wreck is your VIP Golden ticket to the magical world of CineGame right in your room.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: VTBS Airport
description: Suvarnabhumi International Airport is the primary airport serving Bangkok, Thailand.Pronounced “su-wan-na-poom” meaning 'The Golden Land', it is one of the largest and busiest airports in Southeast Asia and is a major cargo air freight hub for the region.

name: Little Nemo
description: Little Nemo is a tiny 2D Open World game inspired by good Retro titles. Talk, Run, Explore. Find secret passages and characters and discover a Magic World full of Mistery and Color. Little Nemo is a modern Maze Runner Adventure. Can you find the Keys before your Time runs out?

name: Pinball FX: A Charlie Brown Christmas Pinball
description: Find the real meaning of Christmas in A Charlie Brown Christmas Pinball! Join the Peanuts crew in putting on a play and decorating the most perfect tree there is.

name: Level Unknown: Backrooms
description: Embark on a chilling journey into the unknown with the game "Level Unknown: Backrooms," a horror-puzzle set in the mysterious realm of the Backrooms. Test your logical skills and nerves in both a single-player adventure or a multiplayer cooperative mode.

name: Visit From Above
description: Visit From Above is a sit-and-survive horror game (inspired by Five Nights at Freddy's) that puts you face to face with aliens. You will have to survive 3 nights using different methods to defeat the aliens including a flashlight, turning power on/off, and closing your eyes (pretend to sleep).

name: Pinball FX: Game Night Pinball Volume 1
description: "Get ready for a game-changing experience as Zen Studios partners up with Asmodee to bring you three tables based on the best tabletop games. Step into a new realm of pinball, and remember, just like with the dice, a single flip can change everything. "

name: Pinball FX: Star Trek Pinball
description: Boldly go, where no one has gone before in Star Trek Pinball! Explore 3 tables based on the fan favorite movies and TV series of the franchise ranging from classics to the present day, and live long and prosper on the leaderboards!

name: Survival Mission Z
description: Loot and shoot in this action-oriented adventure set in a zombie apocalypse. Acquire different guns, explore various locations and interact with other survivors on your mission towards a better future.

name: Lost in Dread
description: A first person horror adventure game where you play as a timid protagonist- experiencing a near death experience caused by his bullies sending him to a ghost realm. To reduce your character's fear, take all necessary steps, such as covering your ears.

name: Astro Hunters VR
description: Embark on an epic interstellar journey in Astro Hunters VR, the open-world VR action game set in space. Immerse yourself in the exploration of diverse planets, fight with different enemies, craft, gather resources, and upgrade your weapons – either solo or in multiplayer.

name: Mirage Feathers
description: Maybe one day, I won't have to fight when I fly.

name: Fable Hospital
description: Embark on a hospital management game where you lead a medieval hospital and face comical diseases. Hire staff, design wards and assign tasks while your employees take care of patients in a hilarious way.

name: Desert Island in Summer?
description: Hikaru sets off for a fun-filled summer vacation at his university's club retreat. However, a sudden fierce storm blows in, causing their boat to drift off course, leading to them being stranded. Will Hikaru be able to make a girlfriend before they manage to escape this predicament?

name: The Milgram Experiment
description: A first person narrative game, based on one of the most controversial psychological experiments of all time. Step into the shoes of an unwilling subject faced with the toughest moral choice: who lives and who dies. You alone will decide who to kill and who to spare. Please wishlist!

name: Real
description: "Real" is a unique immersion into the world of minimalism and moral challenges. This Art game offers players not just to solve puzzles, but also to reflect on their place in the world and the values they bring to society.

name: Super Space Planet Fighter
description: Fight fast-paced boss battles against Moons, Planets, and even Stars as you travel through solar systems on a perilous mission to destroy the Core of the Universe as pirates, aliens, and cosmic horrors hunt you down while you explore the depths of the cosmos and collect unique technologies.

name: Climb Up! Battle Royale
description: Stay at the top or reach the top by competing with both your friends and others. Push, shoot and knock down your opponent and above all, have fun!

name: Before Time Runs Out
description: In this modern twist on 2D platformers, make your way through numerous traps and obstacles such as spikes, saws, laser beams, and explosives to reach the goal at the end of each level. Each level has a limited amount of time to complete. So speed is key, or else it's game over.

name: Orcs in the Forest
description: Orcs in the Forest is an exciting 2D platformer where a cute bunny goes on an exciting adventure in a wonderful forest. Your main goal is to collect as many carrots as possible, and many obstacles and enemies await you along the way.

name: .Forty-Five
description: A perfect mix of card game, rogue-lite, and pure wild west mayhem. Explore an ever-changing map, collect cards, and battle enemies. Cards are Bullets and are loaded into the revolver to gun down enemies. Experience .Forty-Five's innovative gameplay for 100% free and open source.

name: Tales Of Two Heroes
description: Tales Of Two Heroes is a roguelite deckbuilder about two heroes saving the world. Fight, collect, and survive. Who would reach the Altar first, and bring peace to this land?

name: Cell Hacker
description: A cellular automaton-like MMO game based on text terminals. Players will write unique cell reproduction logic and place cells in the vast cell world to grow, reproduce, compete, cooperate with other players' cells, and write their own species history.

name: Kitty Cat Combat
description: A unique tactical military simulation RPG that fuses fantasy with modern warfare. Unite under the pawprint banner!

name: Green Again
description: Green Again is a chill and cozy city builder game. Help a tribe of little plant people reclaim their planet taken over by defective robots. Build, decorate, and expand your settlement. Grow crops for your citizens, explore the unknown, and return the land to its former green state!

name: The Brilliant Coup
description: A fun and exciting 2D pixel art point and click adventure game with classic commands. Steal a world-famous brilliant from the best guarded bank in the country.

name: Uber Urban
description: A modern, indie, interpretation on the well established genre of city builders; meet Uber Urban. With genre-defining mechanics as well as more innovative ones, Uber Urban enables players to build the city of their dreams like never before.

name: Forced Sacrifice: Lost Soul
description: Nothing can stop the inevitable. Everything will play out, just as it has been planned. Forced Sacrifice: Lost Souls is a bullet-hell game with a storyline reaching for metaphysical and theological topics. Gather the power, get rid of demons and retake The Soul from the traitors.

name: Z speed Arcade
description: Z speed Arcade, The retro endless driving game inspired by early 90s racing game but combination with modern graphic which give higher resolution. Avoid the traffic, escape the cop, collect the boost and boost yourself into another car!!!

name: Slasho
description: Dive into Slasho, a mouse-driven bullet hell roguelike where your precision guides a samurai's blade. Cut through hordes, unlock skills, and face unique enemies in this action-packed quest for supremacy. Are you ready to defy death and embrace the samurai's path?

name: Land of Ramchin: Between Dimensions
description: Land of Ramchin is an Action RPG adventure game where players will play as Vico to explore the fantastic open world of the vast land of Ramchin, travel between dimensions and seek the origin of the world.

name: SeesawC 1
description: SeesawC 1 uses games and videos to teach 120 English vocabulary words.

name: Pro Show Jumping
description: Experience the world of professional show jumping with this simulation-based game! Ride realistic courses with a variety of horses, train your eye for distances, design your own courses and share them with friends.

name: Kenshin Ninja
description: Kenshin Ninja is an intense platformer with mixed RPG elements. With superior acrobatic and deadly weapons, Kenshin is ready to face menacing traps and enemies who have sworn to protect the shadow devil Som-on.

name: Die For Light
description: This is a game about repetition and never ending failure, face the unknown road ahead, failure is inevitable, but "memory" will record this failure for you, help you to cross it next time, until "right".

name: Rock and Roots
description: Rock and Roots is a captivating VR journey where you wield the power to dictate the ebb and flow of battle. Summon your enigmatic guardians of the woods with a magical hand to face the challenges. Conjure spells, dive into the magic world and reclaim your rightful place on the throne!

name: Dragon Shelter
description: Dragon Shelter is a farm sim set in a fantasy world. Take on the role of a hero who will revive the long-lost friendship between humans and dragons. Take care of wondrous creatures, explore the magical world, and restore destroyed biomes!

name: Veil
description: Demon-powered tactical FPS.

name: Zlime: Return Of Demon Lord
description: Enter the world of Zlime, an action Roguelike game where you'll embark on a thrilling adventure in a demonic realm. Experience an unique transformation system, devour your foes, enhance your powers, and battle your way to victory! Prepare for an exhilarating and challenging gameplay experience!

name: Night Nite
description: "Night Nite" is a horror comedy adventure game set in modern times. One day, mysterious events begin to unfold around you. What could be the true identity behind these occurrences?

name: Vvav One
description: Vvav One is keyboard rhythm game where you challenge your limit, play and comptet others while enjoy various music.

name: Watermelon Suika Game
description: Embark on a puzzle adventure to prevent fruit overflow! Strategically collide fruits, crafting colossal watermelons. Join this exciting challenge of combining matching fruits to conquer the leaderboard and master the art of creating giant watermelons.

name: Ghostrunner II: Ice Pack
description: Equip the chilling power of the cybernetic future today with Ghostrunner 2's first DLC, the Ice Pack! Brace yourself for a bone-chilling experience, with a web-inspired twist that will redefine the way you hack and slash through the neon-lit cityscape.

name: For Honor: Highlander Hero Skin - Oathbreaker Maddox
description: Become a treacherous survivor with the Oathbreaker Maddox Hero Skin, a full body customization of the Highlander.

name: Aura: Hentai Cards - Revenge of the Fox Spirit
description: Strange disappearances of men have begun in the steampunk town of KongGong, so cat detective Miyu is sent there for investigation. Here, in this unusual place, technology has begun to supplant magic, but one ancient spirit clearly doesn't like it...

name: Whispers in the West: Two Bad Sisters
description: From the writer of “Overboard!”, Jon Ingold - Miss Sara Estelle has arrived in Brimstone, and she needs your help tracking down a valuable possession left in the care of the priest. There’s only one problem: the priest swears she already came and collected it herself!

name: Across the Obelisk: Amelia, the Queen
description: Amelia, the Queen comes with: A new hero: The Queen, with a set of cards focusing on cold damage and vanishing cards. Rifty, a new pet that removes buffs from your opponents3 skins for The Queen3 new card backs 5 emotes for the QueenNew reply options during events

name: Undying: Skin Pack - Series 1
description: Welcome to Undying Skin Pack - Series 1! Download it now, and add a touch of fun to the hard life of survival for mother and child!

name: Train Simulator: Chatham & Medway Valley Scenario Pack
description: Explore the heart of Kentish countryside and take on new challenges across Chatham & Medway Valley with this scenario pack from Suburban Glasgow.

name: Otherworld Legends: Skin - Mint & Sea Salt Millefeuille
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Hell Let Loose: Red Skies
description: Blaze into glorious victory with the Red Skies DLC. Used by soldiers throughout the war, particularly in battles between January and February 1942, the Soviet Airborne uniform was worn by soldiers to help them fight in even the most adverse weather conditions.

name: Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord - Heroes Assemble
description: 'Heroes Assemble' expansion pack introduces 24 new generals and exclusive sets, allowing players to choose and experience the charm of unique generals at the beginning of the game.

name: Michihaku Lucient 2: Itsuka, Kimi ga Otona ni Natte mo
description: Sin descripción

name: XMas Toy Merge
description: Match as many as you can and get your best score!

name: American Truck Simulator: Michelin Fan Pack
description: We're thrilled to present a fresh collection of truck tires and accessories, officially licensed from Michelin for American Truck Simulator. To enhance the experience, we've added a variety of "aftermarket" goodies and paint jobs, creating a blend that's sure to bring joy to any Michelin enthusiast.

name: Kairai Kiniki
description: Sin descripción

name: Artillery Blast
description: Come and cum! The young ladies feel so uncomfortable, they are trapped inside and can hardly breathe.

name: Dorei Same
description: An erotic top-down adventure game about a woman who lost everything and now has to adjust to her new life as a slave for a noble's daughter. Explore the castle and figure out a way to escape the lustful maiden.

name: Sweet Flip
description: Honey, please turn over the cards and see which girl you like, or you want them all.

name: MAOUISHO:~ La Dolce Vita with Another World's Demon Lord~
description: One day, you encounter a wounded woman, unable to communicate verbally and emitting an aura of suspicion. Despite the mysterious circumstances, and burdened by the physical and mental toll of a harsh corporate environment, you decide to welcome her into your life.

name: Ruthless Smile
description: Ruthless Smile is the story of a girl named Ururu who was trying to save her friends from their cruel fate of becoming God-Bound. Explore an episodic story of humans and Gods and the cruel world they face.

name: Endowed
description: Sin descripción

name: Medieval Dynasty: Co-Op Mode
description:
Medieval Dynasty expands with Co-Op map for up to 4 players.

Medieval Dynasty's new co-operative map, The Oxbow, introduces a new exciting location that will also feature enigmatic characters, captivating landmarks and charming villages. Leading the way is Piastovia, the heart and soul of the Oxbow where your epic journey begins.

name: The Book of the Dead: Lost Souls
description:
The Book of the Dead: Lost Souls is immersed in a gloomy atmosphere of horror, which is overflowing with the storyline of the novel. The game is made in the genre of visual storytelling, in which you will observe the events of a young man named Charles and his wife Emily. The heroes inherit a mansion from their uncle, to which a young couple goes. Upon arriving at the place, strange events begin to occur after a while, which will scare the guys and face otherworldly forces.

Users will observe the events taking place with the help of illustrations made in an anime style. The game creates a feeling of gradually escalating suspense, intimidating and arching

name: Rainbow Fish and the Whale
description: Based on Marcus Pfister's children's book 'Rainbow Fish and the Whale'. An interactive underwater adventure where you can talk and play games with sea creatures.

name: Magicarat Radiant
description: Second year student Hiroaki at the Arihara Gakuen meets two girls on a summer day. These two grils tell him, that they're magicians and with this event his normal life descends into chaos.

name: Trouble Outsiders
description: An old visual novel from Petit, set in the Edo period. It is about a westerner killer that is hired as a bodyguard and a self-acclaimed disciple heroine, that tries to compete with im at every step. Together they have to save the world.

name: The Bodega Court of Salty DQs: Amai Edition
description: A visual novel featuring a young man named Dennis, who must save a thug operated restaurant by winning two million dollars in a tennis tournament.

name: Super Pac-Man Pinball
description: An unreleased follow up to Pac-Man Pinball Advance, why it got cancelled is unknown.

name: Crash Landed
description: An unreleased Crash Bandicoot game which would have had Crash trying to save primitive bandicoots (or 'bandicutes' as they were called in the concept art) from Neo Cortex. It was cancelled after 2 years of being in development and Activision after acquiring rights to the franchise decided to lay off the entire Radical Entertainment studio behind Crash Landed.

name: They Can Hear Us
description: "They Can Hear Us," the first episode, narrates horror stories that interact with you through the microphone, playing on the fear of whoever is listening.

name: DunJumb
description: Whether you choose magic, swords, or both, make your way through the thousands of monsters attacking you! DunJumb is a colorful 2D medievial survivor game with roguelite elements, in which you create, buy and reinforce a combination of weapons against formidable enemies!

name: Seasons of Rocco
description: Help Rocco prepare for the winter season by gathering and sorting fruit at his Tree House in the autumn season. Plant new fruit trees in the spring season, to make sure Rocco has even more food next winter! A relaxing experience for cozy gamers who seek a delightful escape into the charming seasons.

name: Clue: Black Adder Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Occult Crime Police: Medium at Large
description: The sequel to Occult Crime Police. Boomtown, USA is visited by a spirit medium who claims to be able to solve the case which ruined Sheriff Miranda Warren's life seven years ago. Everyone in town has a reason to be upset about the upcoming seance, but could someone be upset enough... to kill? Explore the set of a ghost hunt, uncover evidence to reveal the truth, and interrogate rude and/or stupid witnesses to unravel a mystery that defies the very laws of reason!

name: The Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle 2 DX
description: A colorization hack of The Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle 2 bringing it Game Boy Color

name: Goodbye Tired Stars
description:
"What's the best place to watch the end of the universe?"

Accompany a cosmic being in finding a place among three different planets to watch the end of the universe from. And on the way, walk, observe, and remember...

name: Fathomless
description: Travel alongside Plane as he delves deeper and deeper into the twisted tunnels of a long-forgotten cave. Don't worry though, as you'll always have your pal Franklin by your side! With the two of you working together this cave should be a breeze...

name: Locked
description: Locked in a deadly cat-and-mouse with a relentless serial killer, you must outsmart, escape, and survive in this intense 2D horror experience. Solve chilling puzzles, and stay one step ahead of a relentless pursuer. Inspired by PS1-PS2 classics and iconic horror films.

name: Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition 2.0
description: The 2.0 update of Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition adds two full-length story modes, featuring different gameplay and characters!

name: Italian Super Car
description: Sin descripción

name: Lunistice 1.5: Accel Coda
description: Lunistice 1.5: Accel Coda is an upcoming free content update for Lunistice, it overhauls major parts of the base game, ranging from new character models and animations to minor and major reworks of the original levels! Besides Accel, it also adds three additional playable characters - each with their own bonus stage. And if you like replayability, the new Randomizer Mode will have you covered!

name: Sonic Robo-Blast! From The Past
description: Sonic Robo-Blast! From The Past is a remake of two classic fangames from 1998 on a new engine in "standard definition 480p widescreen" with rad new features!

name: Link's Awakening DX HD
description:
Dive into the enchanting world of The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening DX as you've never experienced it before, with this meticulously crafted PC version that breathes new life into this classic adventure. Immerse yourself in the nostalgia of Koholint Island with enhanced graphics and widescreen support, bringing the charming landscapes and characters to vivid detail on your modern PC display.

But that's not all – we've turbocharged the gameplay with high framerate support, ensuring that every sword swing, puzzle solve, and enemy encounter feels smoother and more responsive than ever. Rediscover the magic of this timeless Zelda title with improved performance, letting you explore dungeons, uncover secrets, and engage in epic battles with unparalleled fluidity.

Whether you're a long-time fan of Link's Awakening or a newcomer to the series, this PC version offers a fresh take on the beloved classic, combining the essence of the original with cutting-edge enhancements. Embark on a journey across the mysterious island, solve puzzles, meet quirky characters, and relive the adventure with a level of polish and finesse that pays homage to the legendary legacy of The Legend of Zelda.

The game was taken down by Nintendo.

name: Xeno Fighters R
description:
Xeno Fighters R is an in-development shmup fangame inspired by the Raiden Fighters series by Seibu Kaihatsu.

This game features gameplay inspired by shmups made by Seibu Kaihatsu and Psikyo, in which enemies attack with relatively fewer, but faster, projectiles. It is different from bullet hell shmups like most of CAVE's games and Touhou, in which the screen can contain hundreds of bullets that are slow. Seibu-style shmups focus on quick reaction times and awareness of enemy locations, compared to bullet hell shmups, which focus on dodging and weaving through intricate bullet patterns.

The game has four original ships: the Amada Vipros, the Phyxius, the Zaiva, and the Xelcor. It also features guest fighters from other shoot 'em up games by Psikyo, Capcom, Konami, and others.

There are 20 stages to play in the game with four different game modes to select from.

name: Topps NHL Skate
description: Sin descripción

name: Suzy's Modular Run
description: Sin descripción

name: Froggy Froggy
description: You're a little frog dude. Your parents and siblings has been captured by a big fat man and taken to his big dungeon full of those red bouncing toads. Will your family be safe and sound? Let's found out!

name: Fluffles Rainy Day
description: Can you help fluffles get through the rain? This pup doesent like getting their paws wet unfortunately they’ve gotten themselves stuck out in a storm. Try and avoid as many puddles as you can so that Fluffles doesent get wet!

name: Shadow Hunter
description:
You must catch all the ghosts of each screen, only in this way you can activate the trap that you must collect and activate it to finally enclose them and move on to the next screen.

You will find levers that give you access to restricted areas, as well as areas with blades or lava that will make your life a little more difficult.

Time is limited on each screen so you don't fall asleep.

Once you have caught all the ghosts of the 4 floors of the building you will have completed your mission, good luck!

name: Banished
description:
"I… am… an OLD GOD…. long ago… I was trapped… Banished!... To another dimension… a thousand years, beyond reflections… however… the barrier has weakened… If only for a moment… long enough!... to consume!….

Will you consume your prey, or will you be trapped in the mirror world forever?Uncover the terrifying mysterious life of the monster from the mirror universe stalking and eating humans! 3 bone-chilling levels. Mirror world mechanic. Different NPC types.

The objective is to find the right moment to grab prey.

Plan your attack, but don't forget to improvise. Travelling through the real world drains your hunger. Eat humans to restore hunger and grow strong enough to reach the next level. Beware! Alerted humans give chase on sight and can destroy you. Use the mirror universe to traverse blocked paths but there are blocked areas there too. Catch the humans unaware. You have 3 respawns per level. You hunger and humans are the only threat to your immortality.

Dank original chiptune trap soundtrack Inspired by: Junichi Masuda's Legendary Lavender Town theme, $uicideboy$, Cardi B, Haarper, Freddie Dread, and Bleed the wicked menace!

name: Black Out!
description: Sin descripción

name: S.o.L.o.
description:
../ Year 2.433 - Planet Tartessos /..

Unexpectedly, humans leave the mining planet, abandoning hundreds of robots to their fate under the sole tutelage of an artificial intelligence called I.S.A.C.

The extractions of ETHER (a valuable substance unique in the galaxy) are beginning to affect the circuitry and positronic minds of some of the robots.

… 100 Years Later …

name: Caim
description:
Caim is a top-down action-adventure game for the C64. It balances action, exploration and puzzles with an emphasis on the narrative.

You, an unnamed player, wake up in a strange place without any recollection of how you got there. Explore the facility, avoid deadly hazards and uncover mysteries. As you learn more about the place, the world and yourself, you get ever closer to putting together all the clues and reaching the exit.

The music tracks are by unknown composers from HVSC. The story was inspired by The Talos Principle. Use joystick in port 2 to play

name: Jump Out
description:
Jump Out is a brand new Commodore 64 game.

Jump off all tiles in 30 different puzzles.

Jump Out has a password system to load already played levels. Password for the puzzle is given at the start of the level.

name: Ninja Poison
description:
Riuken has been captured.

His efforts to protect the lands of Sindara have been in vain. The army of Lord Oni Antrax is sowing chaos in its path and exterminating one by one all the royalty of Sindara. The only hope there was is over, Riuken is imprisoned in the Prison Dungeon built by Lord Oni Antrax himself.

Our protagonist is the son of King Haoken of the Highlands of Sindara, of an unattainable power that has been banished by the Machiavellian Lord.

His next target was Riuken the King's son, he has captured him and injected him with a lethal poison that will consume his life little by little.

Some time ago King Haoken went in search of Lord Oni Antrax, arriving and entering his infernal laboratory, where he manufactures this deadly poison. Haoken disappeared and was never heard from again. Until today Riuken has been a prisoner. The King has been leaving along the winding road some antidotes that will keep us alive.

The road is hard, but Riuken has the great hope of finding Lord Oni Antrax and kill him once and for all, so that happiness can return to Sindara.

name: Re-Bomber
description:
Your mission:

You must redirect bombs that are falling from the sky onto the enemy (tanks and other war machines that are on the ground). To do this, you must fly over the bombs and press and hold the Joystick button (or SPACEBAR) to capture them.

To drop the bomb, just release the button (or spacebar).

Try to score 25 points (on the left scoreboard) before the tank reaches the left edge of the screen (or before the score on the right side reaches zero).

name: Ziona Quest
description:
The Year is 1023, the call went out for brave souls to come join the quest to help humanity free themselves and return the Earth to her true heavenly glory...

...you answered.

WELCOME BRAVE SOUL!!

Ziona Quest is a frantic platformer where skill, strategy and quick reactions are essential if you are to complete your mission.

description:
Princess Maker Q is a quiz game from the Princess Maker franchise.

Princess Maker Q was meant as a prologue to an early version of Princess Maker 4, however, when the creator of the Princess Maker franchise, Takami Akai, supposedly faced health issues the original concept of Princess Maker 4 was cancelled.

description: Princess Maker Mobile or officially Princess Maker is a game in the Princess Maker franchise released for android and iOS developed by mgame in 2015. It is available in Japanese and Korean. Service was officially discontinued in February of 2022.

description: Join Leon the Chameleon as he journeys to save his family from the belly of Tum Tum, in the sequel to the BAFTA nominated smash hit for mobile Super Yum Yum. Our hero Leon has come home from his latest fruit licking mission in Pond Town, to find that greedy Tum Tum has gobbled up all of Leon's baby chameleons along with his winter fruit supply!! Leon must follow the trail of fruit and babies across Jungle, Beach, Pond worlds and eventually blasting off into Space, in order to confront Tum Tum and rescue all of his little ones.

name: Demeter
description: In this revolutionary platformer, you will find yourself for the first time ever solving puzzles, fighting enemies and exploring a brand new world in your own living room. The game uses mixed reality to create levels and challenges in real time that adapt to the environment you are in. Climb, jump, fly and run using your walls - and your furniture! - in a way you have never experienced before.

name: Swarm 2
description:
With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!
As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface.

Play in mixed reality for a blend of the real and unreal, or enjoy full VR mode, or better yet try both! From simple to devious puzzles - explore, interact, and embrace the truly unexpected!

A new sensation!?

name: G-Mode Archives 53: Daienkai Buchou
description:
Aim to be the biggest banquet manager in Japan!! Let's liven up the banquet with partitions and care!

"Daienkai Buchou" is a collection of mini-games based on the motif of Japanese salaryman culture "Banquet".

Let's play unique and varied mini-games to liven up various banquets such as year-end parties, New Year's parties, cherry blossom viewing, barbecues, etc., and improve the skills of the secretary!
In addition to "Drinkers" who pour beer into the mug, "Sashi-turning" to help with entertainment, etc., all 9 types of mini-games full of seasonal feeling such as "Cherry Blossom Viewing", "Nagashi Somen" and "Fireworks Festival".

Also, let's collect bingo prizes with bingo tickets that you can get when you get a high score.
Depending on the degree of collection of prizes and the score of the game, the title of banquet manager will be increased! Please aim for the ultimate title!

name: Nyasha
description: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

name: Europa Truck Driving Sim 2021

name: Nurse Sofi

Additionally, players highlight such game features as indie, casual, simulator and adventure. The game is designed for single player, multiplayer modes are not provided.

name: The Ever-Changing Jianghu
description: The Ever-Changing Jianghu is a light rogue martial arts RPG game that strives to incorporate the essence of fast-paced rogue gameplay into the world of RPG. You will make choices in drastically different starting scenarios, providing you with a "unique experience every playthrough" in the RPG realm.

name: Eternal Struggle
description: A game that combines hardcore platforming of classics like Celeste with mind-bending puzzles with lasers, portals, and many more.

name: RoPan
description: RoPan is an action game, in an open mini map in which you can explore every corner, you will find traps and enemies everywhere and so complete missions from the salesman Saber and you will have several weapons and items to help you.

name: Blackthorn Winter
description: You were chosen to break the icy chains that shackle the land! Feel the pulse of Slavic folklore beating in tandem with the thrill of arcade games and the depth of RPG character development. Alone or in pairs, craft skill trees to overcome an ever-changing world where no two adventures are alike.

name: Opera Nova
description: A 3D Music Experience for VR

name: Binary Dungeon
description: Card-based roguelike dungeon crawler

name: Snatchy Carrots
description: Snatch 'dem carrots!

name: Escape the Arcade
description: A casual escape room game for Playdate

name: Mina's Garden
description: Classic maze puzzle game for playdate console

name: Survival Advanced
description: Welcome to the archipelago! Here, you are free to do as you please, but be cautious... some islands are full of danger. To protect yourself, explore, build your shelter, arm yourself, and conquer your enemies.

name: Mr. Jones: Retrubition
description: Mr. Jones:Retrubition is a third-person action and adventure game. Paul Jones was a family man who lived an ordinary life. But one dark night, their lives turned upside down in a matter of seconds. Do you want to join Paul Jones' adventure right away?

name: Altitude's Toll
description: Altitude's Toll is a short walking simulator mystery set in Himalayas. Deliver packages as sherpa and uncover possibly the biggest Himalayan secret in history.

name: Weird Meese
description: An exploration game about photographing strange moose, wander through the last moose civilization and take pictures of it's inhabitants to help out moose and humans. As you photograph, you will discover the sinister plot lurking in the moose town.

name: Clem: The First Attribute
description: CLeM: The First Attribute is a free prologue that offers the first loop of CLeM, a narrative-driven puzzle adventure game with a dark twist. Wake up in a world where puzzles intertwine with exploration, weaving a unique narrative rooted in alchemy.

name: Paper Sky
description: Experience the rush of an adrenaline-fueled paper plane adventure in an interactive semi-open world. Explore stunning landscapes in various art styles as your paper plane transforms into a ball, rolling and soaring through thrilling challenges for an unparalleled high-flying action!

name: Kingdom's Deck
description: Kingdom's Deck is a city-builder and deck-builder game where you embark on a journey to transform your humble hamlet into a formidable empire. Deploy your cards wisely, defend your walls from sieges, manage your resources, respond to various exciting events, and create the ultimate Kingdom's deck!

name: Crazy Monster
description: A tower defense shooting game where players take on the role of a hero and defeat powerful and crazy monsters with their allies!

name: Astra Ignota
description: A relaxing, space-themed puzzle game where you fill a board using symmetrical figures. An idea originally from the authors of the Sudoku, much harder than it looks! All boards are hand-crafted for maximum enjoyment.

name: Perfect Chess
description: Chess Designed Specially for GAMERS! Integrated with the XZ Tutorial, which teaches you everything to play a competitive and successful game Have a LESS Boring and More Dynamic and Competitive Game Awaken the "Grand Master" in you today!

name: WorldShaper Idle
description: A tile-based world-building idle game. Place forests, rocks, mystical flowers and much more. Discover new tiles by experimenting with their placement. Then try to use their bonuses to optimize your production, or just sit back and become more powerful! What will your world look like?

name: Brutal Ball
description: Brutal Ball is a retro-styled shooter-sport hybrid where players can kill each other with gauntlet weapons or giant controllable spiked balls of destruction. Players strive to work together and dominate a match scoring goal after brutal goal.

name: Gamblemancer TD
description: Gamblemancer TD is a tower defense game where you decide how your towers work. Customize 6 different towers based on typical role-playing dice D4 to D20.

name: A Long Dark Night
description: A Long Dark Night is a Lovecraftian narrative-driven game. Navigate the stormy Gulf of Maine, unraveling the truth behind your family's past. Explore a beautiful seaside, shape the narrative with your choices, and confront shocking revelations in this gripping story, taking place at sea.

name: Bloodsong
description: She's just a teenage siren. Let her rock... Play as Mari, a punk rock siren princess, who’s hell-bent on headlining her concert no matter the cost. Use your ear and “bloodsong” to match musical pitch, defeat enemies, and solve puzzles along the way. The stage is set–are you ready to rock?!

name: It Mimics
description: "It Mimics" is a short indie horror game heavily inspired by the original Slender The Eight Pages game. Step into the shoes of an unknown protagonist, collect the eight pages, and survive being followed by something lurking in the woods.

name: Warpgate Pioneers
description: Warpgate Pioneers is a game about running around in spaceships with friends. Build your own spaceship, play as the crew on somebody else's spaceship, or form a fleet to take on the mysteries beyond the Warpgate together.

name: Vent Vipers
description: Embark on a serpentine adventure with this fast-paced, 3D snake experience. Slither through twists and turns, collecting apples to ascend to new heights. Outsmart the mazes, claim the top spot, and dive into the challenges now!

name: Small Demon
description: Small Demonis a 2D action roguelike that immerses you in the dark world of hellish labyrinths. As a small but powerful demon, you will face countless different enemies who are trying to destroy you! You need to move around the location, pick up more powerful weapons and destroy enemies.

name: Regular Fit
description: Regular Fit is a 2D platformer. As a tramp, you embark on a dangerous and mysterious journey through a dense forest full of amazing creatures and unseemly obstacles. Your main goal in this game is to survive in this cruel world.

name: Escape from Blackwood
description: From wanting to go visit a castle to being trapped inside it. Solve the clues and discover how to escape from it

name: Slippery Heights
description: Younger, I used to play these games...silently shedding a tear.

name: The Journalist
description: The journalist embarks on a risky investigation.

name: Monkey's Life
description: A stylized emotional role-playing game. The story of a fantastical encounter with a monkey that uses the keyboard to escape from the zoo.

name: Rat Trap
description: Swap, fuse and split to escape! A fast paced, hand-drawn metroidvania adventure based on multiple unique characters that you can fuse together or split apart at will. Use these powers to explore a mysterious facility, solve puzzles and beat the bad guys! Can you escape the Rat Trap?

name: Midnight Kun
description: This is an open-world multiplayer online game where, after being infected with avian flu, Kunkun mutated into a terrifying monster. As a good friend of Kunkun, Susan decides to venture into the forest to seek the Lion Leopards, aiming to rescue Kunkun.

name: Zodiac Landing
