name: Roll Over Princess
description: From the tower of mysterious ruins exuding an enigmatic power, the only things you can bring back are knowledge, memories, and experience. Amidst numerous challenges, combine equipment, legacies, and allies to conquer the top floor!

name: Idle Fishing
description: Relax and catch fish in a beautiful environment. Build up your fishing empire with automated rod setups, bustling markets, and delectable restaurants. Dive into the active challenge of the fishing mini-game for a hands-on experience!

name: Spriggan
description: Enter 'Spriggan,' a captivating multiplayer, first-person strategy game. Master combat, crafting, or city management. By day, focus on city growth and resources; by night, unite with friends to protect your castle from mysterious forces...

name: Noxium

name: Multilateral Planet
description: This is a single player game, in this multi-sided planet, humans in order to survive the attack of mutants, built a tall wall, this is the last city of mankind; Players need to control the character to pick up a sword and shield, to kill mutants, get them to drop food and weapons to arm themselves.

name: Juniper Burning
description: Juniper Burning is a third-person story driven fighting game featuring fast-paced traversal and platforming. Join a young Warrior possessed by an ancient fire demon in a desperate attempt to protect his homeland

name: Soulers
description: Soulers is a Team-Building Twin-Stick Shooter. Assemble a team with time-slowing Protagonist and Colleagues with different abilities, and save the world from invasion of 'Glitch'.

name: NeoDuel: Backpack Monsters
description: NeoDuel: Backpack Monsters is a PvP inventory auto-battler with a monster-trainer twist! Collect Cosmions and items, and strategically manage your backpack to create unbeatable combos in tactical duels. Rise through the leagues to become the ultimate Cosmion master!

name: Shepherd Planet
description: Shepherd Planet is a leisure puzzle simulator game in which you play a witty sheepdog and drive the lambs into the sheepfold.

name: HackeRPG
description: HackeRPG is a coding-based top-down arena roguelite in which you control a programmer avatar to battle hordes of viruses, bugs, trojans, etc. Upgrade you character, create unique builds, and automate your fights by writing code.

name: Meat-Grinder
description: Live the life of Obi, a female killer with questionable morals and a good sense of humor! Witness a real human meat grinder performed by her and meet many unique characters on her way!

name: BraveEmini
description: BRAVEmini is an action game in whitch the player chases and blows up the enemies.Defeat enemies, blow them up, earn combos, and chase them a certain number of times to power up! Knock down bosses with your strengthened heroes!

name: Merry XMerge
description: Merry XMerge is a good board game for all ages this Christmas. Put together Christmas cakes and candies to make them more attractive. Merry Christmas.

name: Void Reaper
description: Pilot your ship through the Void in 'Void Reaper'. Face diverse enemies, upgrade your ship, and battle bosses to reach the End Boss in this action-packed void odyssey. Can you destroy the Void and save the world?

name: Bread around bread around bread around bread
description: A short story about how grandpa went to the store for bread.

name: Tools Up!: Ultimate Edition

name: Fat Lads

name: Void Wizard
description: Dual-wield wands to levitate, manipulate time, conjure explosions, and use other unique abilities in this fast-paced FPS roguelike! Explore procedurally generated dungeons. Buy powerful upgrades from suspicious looking shopkeepers. Defeat the void wizard.

name: Don't Melt the Snowman

name: Generation Zero: Reinforced Flakmoped Pack
description: Get the flakmoped fleet for more ways to fight machines and cover a lot of ground fast. Three-wheeled motorbikes modified to carry others on a shielded flatbed, go off road, or bring a mobile crafting station into the field.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - F-Series: FAA Container

description: Combine the tried and tested with the modern! The new FAA container wagons used in the UK bring new colour to your fleet. In addition to various weather options, this trolley provides brand new containers that are compatible with the standard 20ft / 40ft container industry.

name: Crazy Castle

name: Astroneer: Athlesiure Bundle
description: The Athleisure Suit is a brand new Astroneer Suit exclusively available in this bundle, alongside some of our favorite cosmetic pairings. In addition to the Suit we are bringing back the much requested “Vintage” palette and visor from our archives!

name: Astroneer: Essential Bundle
description: Have you missed some of our themed bundles in the past and wished you could just purchase them without waiting? Well then enjoy the “Essential” bundle, containing some of our best rotating bundles in Exo Outfitters!

name: Astroneer: Suit Bundle
description: In celebration of our 7th anniversary since Early Access launch and our upcoming 5 year 1.0 anniversary, we are releasing this supporter bundle with a collection of some of our favorite Suits and the much requested “Vintage” set!

name: Tennis 2024 Simulator
description: Are you ready to conquer the Grand Slam titles and become a tennis legend?

name: Pocket Foosball

description: Lam ChoTung, who runs a maid cafe in Shenzhen, discovered a girl sitting unconscious on the ground at the storefront as she prepared to return home from the shop. This girl not only had unclear consciousness but was also dressed in peculiar maid attire. This is a love story about these two girls.

name: Ninja Attack
description: You play as a ninja fending off waves of various types of ghosts, each getting increasingly difficult from the last. How many waves can you last before the ghost onslaught overwhelms you.

name: Phantom Unit 999
description: There is a new danger that has befallen the world, which has led to creatures being brought to life Adam is the leader of Unit "Phantoms 999", With your help, you and Adam and his team will pass through strange worlds, upgrade your weapons, and try hard to end this danger and kill whoever caused it.

description: In this unusual game you will shoot with cannons at many types of targets, and you will also find arcade and logical elements. Each subsequent level is a new challenge.

description: A tough exploration-based platformer with souls-like elements.

description: The car passes through obstacles to earn points mini-game.

name: Ego's Spark
description: Is this a nascent ego—or just a nasty bug? Crash headfirst into cuddles, comfort, and maybe even love in this short visual novel about robots and the human heart.

name: Falnarion Tactics III
description: A missing queen, a world engulfed in war, a mysterious new hero. Take control of a colorful cast of characters from both the perception of the heroes and the villains, as you fight the final battle for Nerfelo.

name: D.A.M. Champion
description: Assemble a team of monsters to use during turn-based battles in this Non-Linear RPG. The world of D.A.M. Champion takes an original approach to the concept of being a protagonist in a monster-taming game.

name: The Verge Miner
description: The Verge Miner is an immersive mining, tower defense, and action roguelike game. Jump through asteroids on The Verge of space, and mine valuable resources. These uncharted rogue rocks are filled with space aliens you need to protect yourself against. Choose and upgrade gear for your play style.

name: D.Beta
description: It is a casual game in which you solve various puzzles by manipulating the character with the keyboard in space. The curious “D.” “Alpha” is a cool robot. While flying freely in the sky, you see a wonderful spaceship. It's the story of a robot who enters a spaceship and causes chaos.

name: Catch Flex: AI Dance Game
description: Dive into "Catch Flex," the dance game where professional choreography meets advanced AI motion tracking. Just use your iPhone or Android camera – no extra gear needed! Mimic our dance coach's moves for scoring and calorie counting. Perfect for solo fun or group enjoyment with friends and family.

name: Shade: A Dog's Expedition
description: Join Shade, a loyal Border Collie, and his loving family as they navigate challenges, overcome obstacles, and celebrate the enduring bonds of love.

name: Parallel
description: Fight for the freedom of the multiverse as you leap across dimensions in this third-person 3D platformer. Play as Nohla, a headstrong vigilante, and shift between worlds to stop the death cult threatening everywhere and everyone. Can face your painful past and save the future?

name: Splat!
description: Race your way your down a series of increasingly difficult levels avoiding obstacles and trying to reach the end without going Splat!

name: Enlightening the Soul Country Light
description: This is a 3D ARPG third person action adventure game developed with Journey to the West as the main background. You will experience China's long traditional cultural history and kung fu culture through this game

name: School Curse2
description: The curse continues...

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Voidfarer Pack
description: Made in a close partnership with Games Workshop, Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is a story-rich classical RPG from Owlcat Games, developers of the critically acclaimed game, Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous.

name: Touhou Kaikeidou: Marine Benefit
description:
Touhou Kaikeidou ~ Marine Benefit is a Touhou Project fan game made by Primary-Color Space. It has an oceanic atmosphere reflecting some false predictions that Ten Desires would have an underwater theme.

Marine Benefit features three playable characters to choose from, each of which has three shot types to choose from.

The game features 'Oxygen' and 'Hydrogen' items which, when enough are collected, grant extra lives and bombs respectively. Hydrogen items are also important in that the marker which indicates how many you have also acts as the game's point of collection.

Grazing is also important as it increases Oxygen.

name: FPV Kamikaze Drone
description: "FPV Drone Kamikaze" is a fast-paced action game where players control a combat drone from a first-person perspective. The objective is to destroy enemy equipment in war using maneuvers and explosive devices. Speed and strategy will be the keys to victory.

name: Magicolor TD
description: This game is a fresh take on tower defense strategy, where it's not just about stacking numbers but engaging in a dynamic play of colors. Change the colors of your towers, enemies, terrain, and magical artifacts to create various offensive and defensive effects through color matching. "Magicolor"

name: SCP: Valravn
description: You Never Lose a War, When War Is What You Sell. Play the role of a member of the elite Mobile Task Force to uncover the story of the Valravn Corporation, a shady PMC group involved in human experimentation.

name: Alpaca Wonders Why
description: Alpaca Wonders Why is an interactive adventure for children in the form of a visual novel with a quiz.

name: Love Breakout
description: Relax arcade game to keep you in a good mood

name: Anime Artist
description: Anime Artist is a casual-puzzle game that will allow you to Sketch, Color and Collect anime artworks. Are you ready? This is your best chance to become the ultimate Anime Artist.

name: Touhou Mashousei: Fairies of Sorcery
description: Fairies of Sorcery is a fan-made Touhou Project script for the Touhou Danmakufu shooting game engine. Gameplay is based around the "burst" system, a limited-use skill which removes bullets on the screen and temporarily increases the value of point items. There are three stages in five difficulties plus an extra stage.

name: Hakuga
description: Hakuga is a psychedelic, disturbing and abstract horror game where the goal is simply to walk around and explore the things from the disorient world of the game.

name: Mari Is Home
description: Sin descripción

name: Old Hound of Baker Street
description:
Play as a retired Sherlock Holmes in this text-based murder mystery, where your only eyes on the scene are those of the same person threatening to kill you.

When Sherlock thought his detective life was long over, he finds himself in a new case: solve the murder of the great philanthropist, Mr. Banks, from his office in Baker Street, or die trying.

Be an armchair detective and navigate through dialogue options in order to find the truth. But be careful about how much you press your client and how you word your accusations, or you might not see the next day.

When the client is nervous, your hound instincts will kick in. Will you press forward and try to get the truth, or will you direct the conversation in more subtle ways? Discover who, how, and why, and give the right answers when the time comes.

name: Zet Zillions
description: Zet Zillions is a single-player roguelike deckbuilder where you use your cards to make freakish combinations and explode entire planets. BIG-BADDA-BOOM!

name: Warlings 2: Total Armageddon
description: You are the soldier, you are the general, you are the squad! Take control of your Warlings troops to win the battles! Choose from wide range of weapons to bring destruction upon your enemies and battlefield! Be smart and precise in steps you take, you can outplay your opponent at any time. Win battles, earn gold, expand you arsenal and unlock new classes of soldiers to get ready for next skirmish!

name: Your Last Xmas
description: The house formerly belonged to a singer who had some success in the 1980s as part of a duo, singing about tropical holidays and whatnot, before going solo and achieving greater success with his newfound freedom. There were always the rumors however - that he may have been connected a series of gruesome cannibalistic murders. He passed away a few years back, but some say he returns every December 25th - and Last Christmas, he ate people's hearts...

name: Quake: Contract Revoked
description: Contract Revoked was a 2002 episode consisting of 4 levels and a start map, with knave textures, some modified models, and sounds. It was later made into an official free DLC for the 2021 remaster of Quake.

name: Quake: The Punishment Due
description: A free DLC for the 2021 Quake remaster made from a mod for the original Quake.

name: Apple Bag
description: Working the late-night shift as a cashier in a small town, you starts to form good relations with your regulars. Between flirtations and friendly banter, the specter of a mysterious disappearance haunts your nights as you’re exposed to more and more suspicious behaviors. Are your regulars linked to the missing student, and, more importantly, will you secure a Halloween date?

name: Home
description: In "Home" you experience the story of Li and Halo, who both return home after a long time. It's about feeling disconnected and untrue to yourself. "Home" is an honest short game about trans kids and the roll they have to play for family members.

name: Divine Journey: The Life of Jesus
description: Embark on a Devine Journey, a captivating game narrating Jesus' life through 25 chapters, from birth to resurrection. Experience divine miracles and profound teachings.

name: Albatross
description: Albatross is a FPS/TPS designed with 7 gamemodes for users to play with and includes a singleplayer and multiplayer option. You an play any of the gamemodes with firends and try them all. We hope you enjoy them!

name: The Traveller: Vanilla Version
description: Complete the mission for a secret organization and meet some hot girls and women!

name: Inside the Clockwork Pussy
description: Now, Anais is a formidable boss of a criminal organization that trades and produces an exotic hallucinogenic mushroom. Such a mushroom sexually stimulates its users, making them avid and active pornographic performers.

name: Fritz 19: Steam Edition
description: Attacker, coward, swindler or endgame wizard: I'll show you how to win against anyone! After my World Championship victories in 2022 and 2023, I am the reigning Chess Software World Champion and am now looking forward to showing you how to become even stronger against your opponent!

name: Backstage at Naked Porn Battle
description: Welcome to Naked Porn Battle. The most famous glorious fighting championship in the world. There are no rules and any fighting style can be used. The only requirement is simple: Everyone fights naked and the opponents MUST fuck each other.

name: Endure
description: Top-down shooter meets existential crisis!

name: Orphans
description: Orphans is an adventure, stealth, and puzzle game. Join Victoria in this dark journey through a dystopian city where the most savage instincts stalk in every corner. She must rely on her slingshot skills and agility to be able to free and cooperate with other orphans to survive.

name: Gunpunk VR
description: Are you ready to perform for us? Grab your guns, Dive into our dungeon, and Endure the Desires of the Audience. Will you accept their challenges? Or Defy them, and risk their rage? Never forget: "Entertainment is Everything"

name: Growth
description: Journey to a place where even DEATH doesn’t stop your GROWTH…

name: Tactical Assassin 2
description: Be an assassin in this stick shooter with a total of 9 missions and a variety of weapons / attachments.

name: Sonic Robo Blast
description: A remake of the original Sonic Robo Blast, updating it to a new engine, included in the Sonic Robo Blast from The Past compilation. It aims to recreate the game faithfully, addressing its issues and modernizing its features.

name: Tangerine Panic
description: Avoid getting pummeled to death by giant tangerines for as long as possible!

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2
description:
SRB2 TGF (or SRB2 The Games Factory) was the first version of SRB2, which was developed between March and July 1998 before being scrapped. Unlike all following versions, SRB2 TGF was still a 2D game, created with the game-making tool The Games Factory. Compared to Sonic Robo Blast, SRB2 TGF was considerably more advanced: It featured monitors, springs, shields, spikes and the ability to spin on the ground. The levels included features such as water, moving platforms and mine carts. Enemy collision was much less buggy and the player could now bounce off enemies and monitors.

SRB2 TGF was later scrapped to be released as the 3D game in the Doom Engine.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2
description: A remake of Sonic Robo Blast 2 (The Games Factory) released in the Sonic Robo Blast from The Past compilation. It aims to recreate the game faithfully, addressing its issues and modernizing its features.

name: NYT Games
description: A mobile app consisting of various games by the New York Times, such as the Crossword, Wordle, Spelling Bee, The Mini, and more.

name: Business Empire: RichMan
description:
Business Empire: RichMan is a highly interactive game that provides players with a realistic and engaging business management experience.
Whether you want to open your own business - a store or a bank, become an investor, or purchase luxury items, Business Empire: RichMan has something for everyone. The simulation game's immersive and interactive gameplay provides endless possibilities for players like you to build your empire and become a true RichMan.

name: Color Island: Pixel Art
description: A mobile game where you gradually color in an island by completing color-by-number pictures.

name: Tap Tap Reloaded
description: Tap Tap Reloaded is the ultimate community-driven rhythm game experience. Reloaded is built on what the community wants in a mobile rhythm game. Tap Tap Reloaded is powered by a highly qualified and experienced team of the best Tap Tap players in the world.

name: Sonic Robo Christmas Blast
description: SRB1 Christmas (also known as Sonic Xmas Blast) was released in December 1998, during the period between the end of SRB2 TGF's development and the release of SRB2 Halloween a year later, as it was clear by then SRB2 would no longer be using this engine. It is largely a repackaging of SRB2 TGF's existing levels with Christmas-themed names and a winter theme applied. The ability to save the game was not present however, and the game itself would start immediately on load.

name: A Desert Dusk
description: Large desert themed SP level that also supports coop and deathmatch.

name: Scorpion Garrison
description: Sequel of "A Desert Dusk" - Large desert themed SP level that also supports coop and deathmatch.

name: Brutic
description: Mix of Brutalism and Gothic.

name: The Most Searched Playground
description: Uncover 25 of the most searched people, places, and moments from the past 25 years.

name: Zombie Derby Collection
description: Three Zombie Derby games in one bundle!
